statements: SELECT * FROM media_sources
SELECT media_name, media_type FROM media_sources
SELECT media_name, credibility_rating FROM media_sources WHERE credibility_rating > 3
SELECT media_name, media_type, credibility_rating FROM media_sources ORDER BY credibility_rating DESC
SELECT media_name, media_type, credibility_rating FROM media_sources WHERE media_type = 'news'
SELECT * FROM media_sources WHERE credibility_rating > 3 ORDER BY media_name DESC;
SELECT media_name, media_type FROM media_sources WHERE credibility_rating > 2 ORDER BY credibility_rating ASC;
SELECT media_name, credibility_rating FROM media_sources WHERE media_type = 'TV' ORDER BY credibility_rating DESC;
SELECT media_name, credibility_rating FROM media_sources WHERE media_type = 'Online' AND credibility_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM media_sources WHERE media_type = 'Radio' ORDER BY credibility_rating DESC, media_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM media_sources;
SELECT name, credibility_rating FROM media_sources WHERE credibility_rating > 3;
SELECT id, name, url FROM media_sources ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, credibility_rating, name FROM media_sources WHERE credibility_rating < 2 ORDER BY credibility_rating ASC;
SELECT m.id, m.name, c.rating FROM media_sources m JOIN credibility_ratings c ON m.credibility_rating = c.id;
SELECT name, credibility_rating FROM media_sources WHERE credibility_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM media_sources WHERE credibility_rating < 2 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT credibility_ratings.rating, media_sources.name FROM media_sources INNER JOIN credibility_ratings ON media_sources.credibility_rating = credibility_ratings.id;
SELECT * FROM media_sources WHERE name LIKE '%news%' ORDER BY credibility_rating DESC;

SELECT name, credibility_rating, credibility_ratings.description FROM media_sources INNER JOIN credibility_ratings ON media_sources.credibility_rating = credibility_ratings.id WHERE credibility_rating = 5;
SELECT * FROM MediaSources;
SELECT source_name, source_url FROM MediaSources;

SELECT source_name, rating_name FROM MediaSources INNER JOIN MediaMetadata ON MediaSources.source_id = MediaMetadata.source_id INNER JOIN CredibilityRatings ON MediaMetadata.rating_id = CredibilityRatings.rating_id;
SELECT * FROM CredibilityRatings WHERE rating_id = 1;

SELECT source_name, rating_description FROM MediaSources INNER JOIN MediaMetadata ON MediaSources.source_id = MediaMetadata.source_id INNER JOIN CredibilityRatings ON MediaMetadata.rating_id = CredibilityRatings.rating_id;
SELECT * FROM MediaSources
SELECT source_name, source_url FROM MediaSources
SELECT * FROM MediaMetadata WHERE source_id = 1
SELECT rating_name, rating_description FROM CredibilityRatings
SELECT m.source_name, c.rating_name FROM MediaSources m JOIN MediaMetadata mm ON m.source_id = mm.source_id JOIN CredibilityRatings c ON mm.rating_id = c.rating_id
SELECT * FROM media_sources;
SELECT source_name, source_country FROM media_sources;
SELECT * FROM media_metadata ORDER BY metadata_id DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type, source_country FROM media_sources WHERE source_type='News';
SELECT source_name, rating FROM media_sources JOIN credibility_ratings ON media_sources.source_id = credibility_ratings.source_id;
SELECT * FROM media_sources WHERE source_country = 'USA' ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT source_name, source_type, COUNT(*) FROM media_sources GROUP BY source_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;

SELECT ms.source_name, mm.metadata_description FROM media_sources ms JOIN media_metadata mm ON ms.source_id = mm.source_id WHERE mm.metadata_description ILIKE '%interesting%' ORDER BY ms.source_name ASC;
SELECT mt.tag_name, c.rating FROM media_tags mt JOIN credibility_ratings c ON mt.source_id = c.source_id WHERE c.rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY c.rating DESC, mt.tag_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT source_country FROM media_sources ORDER BY source_country DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_sources;
SELECT source_name, source_url FROM media_sources WHERE source_id = 1;
SELECT source_name, rating_name, rating_value FROM media_sources JOIN source_ratings ON media_sources.source_id = source_ratings.source_id;
SELECT * FROM credibility_ratings ORDER BY rating_id DESC;
SELECT source_name, category_name FROM media_sources JOIN source_categories ON media_sources.source_id = source_categories.source_id;
SELECT * FROM media_sources WHERE source_id = 1;
SELECT source_name, source_url FROM media_sources WHERE source_name LIKE 'News%';
SELECT m.source_name, c.category_name FROM media_sources m JOIN source_categories sc ON m.source_id = sc.source_id JOIN media_categories c ON sc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT r.rating_name, COUNT(sr.rating_id) as rating_count FROM credibility_ratings r JOIN source_ratings sr ON r.rating_id = sr.rating_id GROUP BY r.rating_name;
SELECT m.source_name, r.rating_value FROM media_sources m JOIN source_ratings sr ON m.source_id = sr.source_id WHERE sr.rating_value > 4.5 ORDER BY r.rating_value DESC;
